mapper.insert: insert into message (m_sender_id, m_sender_nick, m_receiver_id, m_receiver_nick, m_title, m_content) values( #{m_sender_id}, #{m_sender_nick}, (select id from member where nickname = #{m_receiver_nick}), #{m_receiver_nick}, #{m_title}, #{m_content})
mapper.select: select count(*) from message where m_sender_nick = #{m_sender_nick}
select count(*) from message where m_receiver_nick = #{m_receiver_nick}
mapper.update: update message set m_sender_del=true where m_num=#{m_num}
update message set m_receiver_del=true where m_num=#{m_num}
